## Assemble nmdat <a name="construct_dataset"></a>

### adsl  <a name="construct_dataset"></a>

```{r, standardize_adsl}
#----------------------------------------------------
# standardize_adsl
#----------------------------------------------------
default_adsl_checkin <- reactive({ 
  read_excel("./lib/pkmeta.xlsx",sheet="adsl",col_names = TRUE)  %>% 
    as.data.frame() %>% filter(!is.na(standard.name))
})

output$standardize_adsl <-renderUI({
  validate(need(globalVars$login$status, message=FALSE))
  
  script = readLines("./script/build_adsl.R")
  script = paste0(script, sep="\n")   # sep="<br/>")
  script = paste0(script, collapse="")
  
  # callModule 
  ALL = callModule(module_build_dataset_wrapper, "standardize_adsl", 
                   ALL, 
                   dataset_name="mYtEsT_for_standardize_adsl",
                   script=script,
                   default_checkin =  default_adsl_checkin()
  )

  # UI  
  fluidRow(column(12, 
                  module_build_dataset_wrapper_UI(id="standardize_adsl", label=NULL)
                  ) 
  )  
})

fluidRow(column(12, uiOutput(("standardize_adsl"))))
```
